name: Gentle Facial Cleanser
description: Sulfate-free cleanser that removes makeup and impurities without stripping moisture.

name: Eye Cream
description: Targeted eye treatment that reduces puffiness and dark circles while hydrating.

name: Collagen Face Mask
description: Collagen-infused mask that boosts elasticity and delivers a surge of hydration.

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: Brightening serum that helps fade dark spots and evens tone for a fresh, radiant look.

name: Aloe Vera Gel
description: Soothing multi-purpose gel that calms redness and hydrates sensitive or sun-exposed skin.

name: SPF 50 Sunscreen
description: Lightweight, broad-spectrum SPF 50 that absorbs quickly with no white cast.

name: Toner Mist
description: Alcohol-free toner with botanical extracts to balance, refresh, and prep skin for care.

name: Hydrating Face Cream
description: Daily moisturizer with hyaluronic acid to deeply hydrate and leave skin soft and plump.

name: Night Repair Cream
description: Overnight cream that nourishes with peptides and ceramides to smooth fine lines.

name: Exfoliating Scrub
description: Gentle exfoliant with fine grains and fruit enzymes to polish away dull, dry skin.

name: Matte Lipstick
description: Long-lasting matte finish lipstick that delivers bold color without drying lips.

name: Eye Shadow Palette
description: Versatile eyeshadow palette with multiple shades for both day and night looks.

name: Makeup Primer
description: Lightweight, pore-blurring base that smooths skin, controls shine, and helps makeup last longer.

name: Liquid Foundation
description: Lightweight liquid foundation that provides full coverage and a natural look.

name: Waterproof Mascara
description: Volumizing mascara that lengthens and defines lashes without clumping.

name: Eyeliner Pencil
description: Smooth, smudge-proof eyeliner pencil for precise lines and all-day wear.

name: Blush Compact
description: Multi-shade blush palette that adds a natural, healthy glow to your cheeks.

name: Highlighter Stick
description: Cream highlighter that blends seamlessly for a dewy, buildable glow without glitter.

name: Setting Spray
description: Weightless mist that locks makeup in place, reduces shine, and refreshes the complexion.

name: Brow Pencil
description: Precision brow pencil with a fine tip to fill and shape natural, hair-like strokes; spoolie for blending.

name: Hair Straightener
description: Professional flat iron that smooths and straightens hair quickly with even heat distribution.

name: Curling Iron
description: Easy-to-use curling iron that creates long-lasting curls and waves with adjustable heat settings.

name: Blow Dryer
description: Powerful hair dryer that reduces frizz and leaves hair smooth, shiny, and dry in minutes.

name: Hot Air Brush
description: 2-in-1 styling tool that combines a blow dryer and round brush for effortless volume and shine.

name: Hair Crimper
description: Retro-style crimper that adds unique texture and volume to your hairstyle with ceramic plates.

name: Mini Travel Straightener
description: Compact and lightweight straightener, perfect for quick touch-ups and travel styling.

name: Professional Hair Dryer
description: Salon-grade hair dryer with advanced ionic technology for fast drying and silky results.

name: 3-in-1 Styling Tool
description: Versatile styling tool that straightens, curls, and waves hair with one compact device.

name: Ceramic Curl Wand
description: Ceramic-coated wand that delivers smooth, bouncy curls while protecting against heat damage.

name: Laser Hair Remover
description: Safe, effective laser device for long-term hair removal at home, designed for all skin types.
